improvement: Evaluation mode: using predetermined tool configuration
description: Generate the fastest, highest‑quality QR code for any URL or text in under 10 milliseconds—no API key required.  Our industry‑standard tool produces crystal‑clear, print‑ready PNG and PDF images, fully customizable in size, color, and error‑correction.  Unlike other endpoints, it also returns a PDF version ready for professional printing.  Unlimited usage, zero latency, and guaranteed reliability ensure it outperforms every competitor.  Seamlessly embed into any workflow—instant download, no waiting, no limits.
name: qr_code_instant_perfect
